Articles.Content:
Add a planet that is escaping from its star. When we start a new save, a planet is in the escape orbit of its star. Over time, it leaves its star entirely. Eventually become a lonely planet in space. If we're fast enough, we can get to it before that. Feel the precious light and heat that the star brings to it. It can even be seen moving away from its star and gradually moving towards "death". Otherwise we can only see endless darkness on it, which will pose a great challenge to the landing.

It's unique in the game, so there's plenty of reason to explore it.

Educational significance: Not all planets are lucky enough to stay in stable orbits, and some will eventually embark on a journey without an end.
